full_summary:
# Rock Crab Trap Survey Vessel Charter

## Tender Reference

*   Solicitation Number: 30004122
*   Tender reference number: cb-5191-53977327

## General Information

The objective of this project is to charter a vessel for two to five days of scientific rock crab trap fishing to support research and conservation of rock crab populations in four study areas. The Department of Fisheries and Oceans Canada requires the services of a contractor to provide a survey vessel for scientific research.

## Project Scope

The contractor will be required to complete up to five days of rock crab trap fishing in four study areas, weather permitting. The study will involve capturing rock crab and by-catch species (e.g., lobster, toad crab, snow crab, cunner, flounders, shrimp, and sea stars) and collecting biological data.

## Evaluation Criteria

The lowest priced compliant bid/offer will be selected. 

## Tender Period

The tender closes on 2023-06-05T13:00:00. 

## Contact Information

Questions regarding the tender should be directed to Sara Gould at DFO.Tenders-Soumissions.MPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca or (506) 470-6349.

## Tender Documents

Tender documents are available on the Canada Buys website at the following link:

https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5191/30004122---rfp-%28en.pdf or https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5191/30004122---ddp-%28fr.pdf. , contract duration ([Expected Contract Start Date](#expected-contract-start-date) to [Expected Contract End Date](#expected-contract-end-date)), *procurement category*, *procurement method*, *notice type*, and trade agreements.
